item.title: @elonmusk: Did you know that Grok Imagine has the most scale in AI image generation? It generated over 5.5 bill...
item.description: Did you know that Grok Imagine has the most scale in AI image generation? It generated over 5.5 billion images within 30 days surpassing competitors like DALL¬∑E, LeonardoAi, Midjourney or Google Veo.

item.description: Good morning my friends. I want to take a moment to tell you how much I appreciate each one of you. Hope you enjoy my first 10 sec Grok video. üíï#Tuesday_Vibes

item.title: @elonmusk: NEWS: X announces partnership with Warner Bros Discovery for the 2026 Winter Olympics in Milano Cort...
item.description: NEWS: X announces partnership with Warner Bros Discovery for the 2026 Winter Olympics in Milano Cortina. The deal brings exclusive Olympics content to X users in Europe and the UK, with brands getting access to in-game clips via X's Amplify offering.

item.title: @elonmusk: Amazing and typical chart. The entire argument for mass migration, of course, rests on the assumptio...
item.description: Amazing and typical chart. The entire argument for mass migration, of course, rests on the assumption that all or most migrants WILL positively contribute to society. But, this....isn't true.

item.title: @elonmusk: Sebastian Gomez-Pena, who is paralysed from the neck down, is one of the first people in the UK to r...
item.description: Sebastian Gomez-Pena, who is paralysed from the neck down, is one of the first people in the UK to receive Elon Musk‚Äôs brain chip. "It's magical," he tells Sky's@t0mclark3, "it's cool to see that when I think about moving my hand something actually happens."

item.description: BREAKING: Elon Musk has just confirmed that Grok Imagine is now generating more images & videos than everyone else combined.

item.title: @elonmusk: BREAKING: House Republicans just introduced the ‚ÄúMake Elections Great Again‚Äù Act. The MEGA Act would...
item.description: BREAKING: House Republicans just introduced the ‚ÄúMake Elections Great Again‚Äù Act. The MEGA Act would: - Require photo ID to vote - Require citizenship verification to register to vote - Require states use paper ballots for federal elections - Voter roll maintenance requirements - Requires mail in ballots be received on election day - Bans ballot harvesting - Bans ranked choice voting - Bans Universal vote by mail - Bans partisan voter initiatives

item.title: @elonmusk: SpaceX is now providing precise positional awareness of objects in Earth orbit to all satellite oper...
item.description: SpaceX is now providing precise positional awareness of objects in Earth orbit to all satellite operators for free. This will greatly reduce the probability of collisions that create orbital debris (space junk) hazards.

item.title: @elonmusk: Proud of the groundbreaking work the@starlinkteam is doing to advance space safety. With Stargaze, w...
item.description: Proud of the groundbreaking work the@starlinkteam is doing to advance space safety. With Stargaze, we have the beginnings of the space traffic system needed to ensure safe satellite operations.

item.description: Thanks to our 1M subscribers in Brazil,@Starlink‚Äôs second largest customer base! Starlink now accepts Pix instant payments and has unlocked sold out regions in all of Brazil.

item.title: @elonmusk: New Tesla Solar Panel & Tesla Panel Mount now available Solar Panel ‚Äì 420W ‚Äì Uses same cascading cel...
item.description: New Tesla Solar Panel & Tesla Panel Mount now available Solar Panel ‚Äì 420W ‚Äì Uses same cascading cell technology as our Solar Roof cells to create 18 power zones (3x more than conventional panels). This reduces energy loss in shaded conditions & produces more energy Panel Mount ‚Äì 33% faster installation by using a groove-based frame system for streamlined assembly (eliminating traditional rails & clamps) ‚Äì Up to 15% fewer roof penetrations while preserving structural integrity & lowering costs ‚Äì Low-profile finish that is universally compatible with shingle, tile, metal & flat roofs
